sentences.text: Save | Comments (20) | Post a comment | Dear editor: Here are some simple questions for "John Q Public" and our Politicians.
sentences.ctext: Save | Comments (20) | Post a comment | Dear editor: Here are some simple questions for "John Q Public" and our Politicians.

sentences.text: First, why have "none" of the mass shootings we've experienced over the past several years been committed with a fully automatic weapon? And secondly, what would be more deadly in a crowded environment such as a shopping mall; a "field of fire" laid down with a fully automatic weapon or a designated target for each individual round from a semi-automatic? Obviously "weapon control" of fully automatic weapons requiring Class III FFL is effective, even though it violates our 2nd amendment.

sentences.ctext: First, why have "none" of the mass shootings we've experienced over the past several years been committed with a fully automatic weapon? And secondly, what would be more deadly in a crowded environment such as a shopping mall; a "field of fire" laid down with a fully automatic weapon or a designated target for each individual round from a semi-automatic? Obviously "weapon control" of fully automatic weapons requiring Class III FFL is effective, even though it violates our 2nd amendment.
